main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 25/05/52 in Portland, Oregon, involving an object shaped like a shallow ball of light which made two flips in different directions and disappeared in 3-4 seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 15 seconds,The object had a stable course before disappearing, The report concludes various possible explanations for the sighting, including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, There was a tremendous increase in speed observed as the object vanished, The weather at the time was clear.
